thread.title: BRIEF-Xerox - Sent Letter To Darwin Deason In Response To Deason Seeking A Waiver To Nominate Directors To Xerox Board

title: BRIEF-Xerox - Sent Letter To Darwin Deason In Response To Deason Seeking A Waiver To Nominate Directors To Xerox Board
text: Market News March 2, 2018 / 11:20 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Xerox - Sent Letter To Darwin Deason In Response To Deason Seeking A Waiver To Nominate Directors To Xerox Board Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 2 (Reuters) - Xerox Corp: * XEROX - SENT LETTER TO DARWIN DEASON IN RESPONSE TO DEASON SEEKING A WAIVER TO NOMINATE DIRECTORS TO XEROX BOARD * XEROX - CONCLUDED DEASON DOES NOT HAVE ANY RIGHT TO NOMINATE DIRECTORS TO SERVE AS MEMBERS OF XEROX BOARD OUTSIDE OF NOMINATION WINDOW - SEC FILING‍​ * XEROX - CONCLUDED DEASON DOES NOT HAVE RIGHT TO A WAIVER OF XEROX’S ADVANCE NOTICE BYLAW PROVISION Source text ( bit.ly/2CSIdCl ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
